about_the_game:
The Advent: Children of Arla invites you to explore the enigmatic planet of Argus, a world created by the Hydrackians—an ancient and advanced civilization—to serve as humanity’s legacy. This RPG hybrid combines massive multiplayer worlds with engaging single-player dungeon adventures to deliver an unparalleled gaming experience.

Key Features:

  • Hybrid Gameplay: Seamlessly transition between vast multiplayer worlds and challenging single-player RPG dungeons.

  • Immersive Lore: Discover the story of Klateqal, the bipedal shapeshifting dragon whose role as humanity’s guardian led to betrayal, banishment, and the fusion of his soul with his enemy, Zo-ar. Unravel mysteries tied to ancient Earth legends and the Hydrackians’ grand plan.

  • Mesoamerican Mythology: Journey through a sub-world inspired by Aztec and Mayan timelines, including ‘Temple Q,’ a breathtaking dungeon set in ancient Teotihuacan.

  • Dynamic Quests and Challenges: Solve intricate puzzles, navigate perilous traps, and complete quests that impact the fate of Argus and its inhabitants.

  • Customization and Progression: Build your character’s skills, unlock unique abilities, and discover rare artifacts to aid in your journey.

  • Stunning Visuals: Explore richly detailed environments, from lush jungles to the surreal landscapes of Argus and beyond.

The Story Begins:

On the home world of Arla, Klateqal—the legendary dragon believed to be the inspiration for Earth’s Quetzalcoatl—was once beloved by his people and destined for greatness. Framed for murder by the cunning Zo-ar, Klateqal was sentenced to banishment. A tragic accident involving Luminoy, a mysterious mineral, fused Klateqal with his enemy, creating a powerful and vengeful being consumed by hatred.

Centuries later, humanity discovers Argus, a planet imbued with remnants of Hydrackian technology and a dark secret tied to Klateqal’s fate. As one of the Children of Arla, you must navigate this mysterious world, face its challenges, and decide its destiny.

Wishlist Now!

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure. Add The Advent: Children of Arla to your wishlist on Steam today and be the first to uncover the secrets of Argus.
